name: search-any-site
title: Search Any Site
description: A "universal search engine". Run this extension in Raycast, enter your search term, choose your search engine, and press enter to search in your browser. Supports adding custom search engines and websites.
author: bert

commands.name: search-the-web
commands.title: Search the web
commands.subtitle: Search any site on the web
commands.description: Select the site-to-search from the dropdown, enter your search term, and choose from the list of search suggestions. Use the "Manage sites" action to add or edit saved sites.

preferences.name: prefill-from-clipboard
preferences.label: Prefill search from clipboard
preferences.description: Whether to pre-fill the search field with the text on the clipboard (if any)
